alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hancock; Coastal Washington (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued December 11 at 3:51AM EST until December 11 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Minor splash-over is possible along vulnerable coastal roads and shorelines. Rocks may be deposited on roads exposed to the open ocean. * WHERE...Coastal Hancock and Coastal Washington Counties. * WHEN...From 8 AM to 10 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Building waves will cause minor splash-over on exposed coastal roads and shorelines. Pedestrians and motorists should use caution along shorelines. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The time of high tide is around 9 am this morning and building waves may cause splash-over in vulnerable locations, such as Seawall Rd on Mount Desert Island and coastal roads along the Schoodic Peninsula.
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
